item.description:
We'll meet at The Point near Faneuil Hall, do a 5-mile loop, and then it's back to The Point for après-run. DRIVING: The Parcel 7 Garage (aka the Haymarket Garage) is across the street from The Point. You can park for $3 up to three hours with validation from The Point. The Parcel 7 entrance is on New Sudbury Street between Congress Street and the Surface Road. NOT DRIVING: The Point is one block south of the Haymarket T station. I'm looking forward to seeing you there! This run is organized by the American Cancer Society DetermiNation program: http://acsdeterminati....

 

Tonight's route:

http://www.mapmyrun.com/routes/view/56620824

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: 5-Mile DetermiNation Pub Run
